div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1846 Bajaur, 1942 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 800-1000 AR Menander: 91+ dr. Apollodotus I: 8+ dr. (square) Antimachus II: 17+ dr. Zoilus I: 4+ dr. Disposition: Sotheby, April 30, 1958 (Haughton), nos. 405 ff., 440 f., 449 ff. Haughton, JNSI 1942, p. 61; NC 1946, pp. 141-2 Shortt, NC 1963, p. 13
